mapper.select: select t1.userCount,t2.deptCount,t3.employeeCount,t4.jobCount,t5.noticeCount,t6.uploadfileCount from (select count(*) userCount from user) t1, (select count(*) deptCount from dept) t2, (select count(*) employeeCount from employee) t3, (select count(*) jobCount from job) t4, (select count(*) noticeCount from notice) t5, (select count(*) uploadfileCount from uploadfile) t6
